description: Enterprise techniques used by ODAgent, ATT&CK software S1170 (v1.0)
name: ODAgent (S1170)

techniques.comment: [ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can execute a specified command line passed via API.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can Base64-decode and XOR decrypt received C2 commands.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can use an attacker-controlled OneDrive account to receive C2 commands and to exfiltrate files.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can use an attacker-controlled OneDrive account for exfiltration.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can identify the current working directory.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can delete payloads and files used to pass C2 commands from remotely hosted cloud accounts.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) has the ability to download and execute files on compromised systems.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can pass commands using native APIs.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)

[ODAgent](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1170) can use the Microsoft Graph API to access an attacker-controlled OneDrive account and retrieve payloads and backdoor commands.(Citation: ESET OilRig Downloaders DEC 2023)
